fullText: The actors are so committed to the mayhem, and so skilled at it, that you can't help but be swept up in their energy, even when the plot becomes as tangled as kelp.

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Strong praise for performances and their infectious energy outweighs criticism of the tangled plot, suggesting an entertaining if flawed show worth seeing for the acting.
